channel.title: RS new skillcape emotes oh no
channel.description:
Lol were going into the 602 age and now there is new skillcape emotes what is this suppose to mean. Lol everyone is going to be freaking out about this if u havent already heard
This week, we have made some animation improvements to standard and skillcape emotes. All standard emotes have now been ‘tweened’ (a process that blends together existing frames of animation). This process results in much smoother animations without changing how they look. We’ve applied this tweening process to all of the skillcape emotes too, as well as adding particle effects to them (things like twinkling lights and fire), giving you even more reason to show off your skillcapes. To see these particle effects, you will need to set the ‘Particles’ option in the Custom Graphics Options menu to ‘Medium’ or ‘High’. A handful of skillcape emotes have also been given an animation overhaul to bring them in line both with our original vision and the quality of the other skillcape animations. We’ve only done this for skillcape emotes that either weren’t fully representative of their skill or where we’d previously hit limitations with the game engine. For more information on these changed skillcape animations, head to Recent Updates in your forum community.

item.title: RS new skillcape emotes oh no
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Not really new, they just tweened the previous frames together causing them to look a lot smoother, on top of that they added some particle effects like smoke.

Read full topic

item.title: RS new skillcape emotes oh no
item.dc:creator: @dannydude8 dannydude8
item.description:
@dannydude8 wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:14, topic:341381”][quote author=dannydude8 link=topic=437778.msg3217797#msg3217797 date=1274846467]
im talking about the new 602 cache whats going to happen to it sinces there is new emotes
[/quote]
Nothing?
Did we leave the 317 cache behind? Did we forget about 459 and 474? How about 508’s and 525s? The cache is going nowhere, but like 459’s and 474’s, I expect we will be seeing less 602’s and more of the newer revisions(have no idea what Jagex’s current revision is) simply because the client offers better features (The skillcapes).[/quote]

There is actually new emotes like the attack skillcape

Read full topic

item.title: RS new skillcape emotes oh no
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

dannydude8:

im talking about the new 602 cache whats going to happen to it sinces there is new emotes

Nothing?
Did we leave the 317 cache behind? Did we forget about 459 and 474? How about 508’s and 525s? The cache is going nowhere, but like 459’s and 474’s, I expect we will be seeing less 602’s and more of the newer revisions(have no idea what Jagex’s current revision is) simply because the client offers better features (The skillcapes).

Read full topic

item.title: RS new skillcape emotes oh no
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

krackkid:

There not that bad tbh.

Its just the transparency being slow’d imo. Can be done in any skillcape emote we have currently. Sure, for some of them it looks cool, but for ones like cooking, fishing, and some of the others, it makes the quality look worse, as if you are lagging.

But thats just my opinion
